languages.text: "Люди...!" {n}Абеляр оглядывается на кашляющих и растерянных людей рядом с вами.{/n} "{name}! Выжившие со средних палуб! Нужно помочь экипажу... вывести... найти обход..." {n}Сквозь рев пламени вы слышите далекие звуки — испуганные голоса, крики... но они проходят к вам словно сквозь водяную толщу, приглушенными и искаженными.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Люди...!" {n}Абеляр оглядывается на кашляющих и растерянных людей рядом с вами.{/n} "{name}! Выжившие со средних палуб! Нужно помочь экипажу... вывести... найти обход..." {n}Сквозь рев пламени вы слышите далекие звуки — испуганные голоса, крики... но они проходят к вам словно сквозь водяную толщу, приглушенными и искаженными.{/n}

languages.text: "The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Люди...!" {n}Абеляр оглядывается на кашляющих и растерянных людей рядом с вами.{/n} "{name}! Выжившие со средних палуб! Нужно помочь экипажу... вывести... найти обход..." {n}Сквозь рев пламени вы слышите далекие звуки — испуганные голоса, крики... но они проходят к вам словно сквозь водяную толщу, приглушенными и искаженными.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The people... The crew!" {n}Abelard looks back.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks — they've been cut off by the debris! We must go back... help them... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

"The people... The crew!" {n}Abelard looks back.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks — they've been cut off by the debris! We must go back... help them... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

"The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a bypass..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

"The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

"The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

"The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

languages.text: “那些人……！”{n}阿贝拉德回过头，看着你身边一脸困惑、不住咳嗽的人们。{/n}“{name}！他们都是中层甲板的幸存者！我们必须帮助这些船员……带领他们冲出去……想办法开辟道路……”{n}在熊熊燃烧的烈焰之中，你听到许多声音从远处传来……惊恐声，尖叫声……那些声音很沉闷，很不真切，仿佛你与那些人被一道水墙隔开了一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那些人……！”{n}阿贝拉德回过头，看着你身边一脸困惑、不住咳嗽的人们。{/n}“{name}！他们都是中层甲板的幸存者！我们必须帮助这些船员……带领他们冲出去……想办法开辟道路……”{n}在熊熊燃烧的烈焰之中，你听到许多声音从远处传来……惊恐声，尖叫声……那些声音很沉闷，很不真切，仿佛你与那些人被一道水墙隔开了一样。{/n}

languages.text: «¡La gente...!». {n}Abelard mira hacia atrás, a la gente confusa que tose a vuestro alrededor.{/n} «¡{name}! ¡Los supervivientes de las cubiertas centrales! Tenemos que ayudar a la tripulación... guiarla... encontrar otra ruta para...». {n}Por encima del rugido de las llamas oyes ruidos lejanos. Voces asustadas y gritos... ahogados y distorsionados como si estuvieran al otro lado de una gran masa de agua.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡La gente...!». {n}Abelard mira hacia atrás, a la gente confusa que tose a vuestro alrededor.{/n} «¡{name}! ¡Los supervivientes de las cubiertas centrales! Tenemos que ayudar a la tripulación... guiarla... encontrar otra ruta para...». {n}Por encima del rugido de las llamas oyes ruidos lejanos. Voces asustadas y gritos... ahogados y distorsionados como si estuvieran al otro lado de una gran masa de agua.{/n}

languages.text: 「人々が…！」{n}アベラルドは咳き込み混乱する周囲の人々を振り返る。{/n}「{name}様！中層デッキの生存者たちよ！我々はクルーを助けなければなりません。彼らを導き出し…避難方法を見つけなければなりません…」{n}燃え盛る炎の向こうで、遠くから何かが聞こえる…怯えた声、叫び声...まるであなたと彼らの間に水域があるかのように、くぐもって歪んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「人々が…！」{n}アベラルドは咳き込み混乱する周囲の人々を振り返る。{/n} 「{name}！中デッキの生存者たちよ！我々はクルーを助けなければなりません…彼らを導き出し…避難方法を見つけなければなりません…」{n}燃え盛る炎の向こうで、遠くから何かが聞こえる…怯えた声、叫び声... まるであなたと彼らの間に水域があるかのように、くぐもって歪んでいる。{/n}
「人々が…！」{n}アベラルドは咳き込み混乱する周囲の人々を振り返る。{/n}「{name}様！中層デッキの生存者たちよ！我々はクルーを助けなければなりません。彼らを導き出し…避難方法を見つけなければなりません…」{n}燃え盛る炎の向こうで、遠くから何かが聞こえる…怯えた声、叫び声...まるであなたと彼らの間に水域があるかのように、くぐもって歪んでいる。{/n}

languages.text: « Les gens... » {n}Abélard se retourne vers les personnes confuses et à bout de souffle qui vous entourent.{/n} « {name} ! Les rescapés des ponts intermédiaires ! Nous devons aider l'équipage... le guider... trouver un moyen de s'échapper... » {n}Par-delà le rugissement des flammes, vous percevez des sons lointains, des voix effrayées, des cris... étouffés et distordus, comme s'ils vous parvenaient à travers une étendue d'eau.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les gens... » {n}Abélard se retourne vers les personnes confuses et à bout de souffle qui vous entourent.{/n} « {name} ! Les rescapés des ponts intermédiaires ! Nous devons aider l'équipage... le guider... trouver un moyen de s'échapper... » {n}Par-delà le rugissement des flammes, vous percevez des sons lointains, des voix effrayées, des cris... étouffés et distordus, comme s'ils vous parvenaient à travers une étendue d'eau.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Leute ...!" {n}Abelard blickt zurück auf die hustenden und verwirrten Menschen um dich herum.{/n} "{name}! Die Überlebenden der mittleren Decks! Wir müssen der Crew helfen ... sie hinausführen ... einen anderen Weg finden ..." {n}Über den tobenden Flammen hörst du entfernte Geräusche ... verängstigte Stimmen, Schreie ... gedämpft und verzerrt, als wäre zwischen dir und ihnen ein Gewässer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Leute ...!" {n}Abelard blickt zurück auf die hustenden und verwirrten Menschen um dich herum.{/n} "{name}! Die Überlebenden der mittleren Decks! Wir müssen der Crew helfen ... sie hinausführen ... einen anderen Weg finden ..." {n}Über den tobenden Flammen hörst du entfernte Geräusche ... verängstigte Stimmen, Schreie ... gedämpft und verzerrt, als wäre zwischen dir und ihnen ein Gewässer.{/n}

languages.text: "Diğerleri!.." {n}Abelard, geriye dönüp, etrafında öksüren kafası karışmış insanlara bakıyor.{/n} "{name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}! Orta güvertelerde kazazedeler var! Mürettebata yardım etmeliyiz! Dışarı çıkarmalı, yol göstermeliyiz!" {n}Kükreyen alevlerin arasından, uzaktan sesler duyuyorsun: Korku dolu konuşmalar, çığlıklar. Sanki arada bir su duvarı varmış gibi boğuk ve çarpıklar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "{name}! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}

Mürettebata yardım etmeliyiz! Dışarı çıkarmalı, yol göstermeliyiz!" {n}Kükreyen alevlerin arasından, uzaktan sesler duyuyorsun: Korku dolu konuşmalar, çığlıklar. Sanki arada bir su duvarı varmış gibi boğuk ve çarpıklar.{/n}

languages.original_text: "The people...!" {n}Abelard looks back at the coughing and confused people around you.{/n} "! The survivors from the middle decks! We must help the crew... lead them out... find a way around..." {n}Over the roaring flames, you hear distant sounds... frightened voices, screams... muffled and distorted, as if there were a body of water between you and them.{/n}
